headline: Seligman Investments Launches $500M Venture Capital Arm
summary: MENLO PARK, Calif., February 12, 2026--Seligman Investments ("Seligman"), the Silicon Valley-based technology investor led by Chief Investment Officer Paul Wick, today announced the launch of Seligman Ventures, a new venture capital arm designed to invest across early-stage to pre-IPO technology companies in the AI and cloud infrastructure, cybersecurity, and modern data-center hardware verticals. The launch represents a strategic expansion of Seligman’s technology investing platform into ventur

raw.headline: Seligman Investments Launches $500M Venture Capital Arm
raw.summary: MENLO PARK, Calif., February 12, 2026--Seligman Investments ("Seligman"), the Silicon Valley-based technology investor led by Chief Investment Officer Paul Wick, today announced the launch of Seligman Ventures, a new venture capital arm designed to invest across early-stage to pre-IPO technology companies in the AI and cloud infrastructure, cybersecurity, and modern data-center hardware verticals. The launch represents a strategic expansion of Seligman’s technology investing platform into ventur

headline: Ameriprise Financial (AMP) Valuation Check After Mixed Recent Share Price Performance
summary: Ameriprise Financial: Recent Returns and Business Snapshot Ameriprise Financial (AMP) has seen mixed share performance recently, including a 4% decline over the past month and a 6.6% decline over the past year, alongside a positive 3 month return of 5.8%. The Minneapolis based firm reports annual revenue of US$18.5b and net income of US$3.6b. The company operates across advice and wealth management, asset management, and retirement and protection products for individual and institutional...
